title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 31.5 - Capital housing rehabilitation corp
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 31.5 - Capital housing rehabilitation corp

State Regulations

Any bank or trust company is permitted to invest in shares of
common stock of Capital Housing Rehabilitation Corp. in a total amount not to
exceed two percent of the investing bank's or trust company's capital stock and
surplus. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
31.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
